div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:
Danish municipalities implementation guide for common informationmodel

description.value: Danish municipalities implementation guide for common informationmodel

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

description.value: Eksempel på medarbejderen Abraham fra akutsygeplejen

Andreas' ydelse daglige opgaver
Andreas' ydelse sociale relationer

A reference to a ServiceRequest. Used to connect an event resource with the order that warranted it

Borgeren Ejnar
Botilbudet Hvidbjerghus som defineret af https://findsocialetilbud.dk/sociale-tilbud/botilbuddet-hvidbjerghus, og SOR
Botilbudet Sommergaarden, som er et fiktivt eksempel
Overall CarePlan for Danish municipalities, for individual plans regarding social care, and health act §140 and §119
Citizen demographics, as expressed by dk-core
Citizens own observation of performance level (udførelse) or importance level (betydning) as defined by FSIII
Documentation for completed inteventions (activities related to one and only one encounter) in Danish municipalities
Detailed information about conditions in Danish municiplities health, social and elderly care.
Extension for the last date a condition was confirmed valid with its current clinical- and verification status, stage and severity, typically the last performed follow-up
Example of the citizen, Mark, who has a pressure ulcer
The rank of a condition. Used for event-resources that refer to conditions that are ranked.
Ejner opfølgningsresultat
Ejnars tilstand:Problemer med misbrug
Opdatering til version 2 af Ejnars tilstand:Problemer med misbrug
Opdatering til version 3 af Ejnars tilstand:Problemer med misbrug, hvor tilstanden afsluttes
Notat vedr. psykosociale forhold, som beskrevet af hjemmesygeplejen ifm sygeplejefaglig udredning
Ejnars udførte opfølgning, der er en opdatering af Ejnars planlagte opfølgning
Ejnar er i sorg pga. ægtefælles død. Dette anvendes i eksemplet som bagvedliggende årsag til misbrug
Ejnars planlagte opfølgning
Encounters used for care and social services in Danish municipalities.
Professional evaluation on citizen status based on gathered information, conditions, observations and citizen preferences used in Danish municipalities
Event history, pointing to earlier significant versions of this resource. Comparable to http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/event-eventHistory, working for Conditions
Conditions which may be used to express the focus of an intervention or the problem of a citizen in Danish municipalities. Mostly used for cross sector use cases.
Follow-up results used in Danish municipalities
Extension for pointing to previous and planned follow up encounters for a condition
Goal as defined in Danish municipalities
FFB goal as defined by FFB in Danish municipalities
Purpose as defined by FFB in Danish municipalities

Henvisning fra læge vedr. akut sygepleje
Hjemmesygepleje – visitation –hjemmehjælp i Sønderborg kommune som defineret af SOR
Områdenotat vedr. hud og slimhinder for Mark
Information gathering resource used to group all the information collected in a clinical process such af a nursing status, a functional ability evaluation or a social paedagogical review
Intern henvisning i hjemmeplejen, efter en opfølgning der viste behov for revisitation
Borger Judith
En diagnose som registreret i kommunen, hvor Hanne fra Aalborg har registreret informationen fra lægen Marianne, som fx kunne komme fra diabetescenteret på hospitalet

Interventions as described by FSIII

Codes that identify who's perspective the matter-of-interest is comming from
Codes that indicate whether an intervention had complications or not
Encounter types in Danish municipality health, social and elderly care (note that these are specific to this model, they are not replicas of a municipality terminology service)
Target groups as defined by FFB
Codes used to distinguish different kinds of goals
Change values for goals (måltype). Express the target value for change of a condition
Change values for goals in FFB (FFB måltype). Express the target value for change of an activity or participation condition
Change values for goals in FSIII (FSIII måltype). Express the target value for change of a health condition or funtional condition

Codes used to specify which kind of information gathering is conducted
